snippet.title: Little-Known Galaxy Trailer
snippet.description:
Little-Known Galaxy   -  Coming May 20th, 2024
Steam & Steam Deck: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2521600/LittleKnown_Galaxy/
Discord: https://discord.gg/gVxUqge9Xf
Website: https://www.littleknowngalaxy.com/
Official Soundtrack: (Coming soon)

Welcome Captain!  Join Space Alliance as a new captain-in-training and work with your crew to solve the mysteries of an ancient relic found on the Grey Planet. Little-Known Galaxy is a cozy single-player RPG space adventure full of friendly characters, exploration, crafting, and farming.

-Made with love by C&K
